DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate sleep cycle before and after fast-track arthroplasty (3 days before and 10 days after) combined with cognitive testing preoperatively, on postoperative day 1,2,10.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Sleep Disturbances Role in Cognitive Test Results After Fast-track Hip and Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: above 60 ASA classification IIV general anaesthesia within 90 days daily use of sedatives, hypnotics og anxiolytics alcohol abuse insufficient written and verbal Danish severe hearing loss and poor sight Parkinsons Disease or other functional neurological deficits Mini mental status < 24 Shift work
